pack: Convert values to/from raw vectors

Functions to easily convert data to binary formats other programs/machines can understand.

Version: 0.1-1
Published: 2008-09-08
Author: Josh Ulrich
Maintainer: Josh Ulrich <josh.m.ulrich at gmail.com>
License: GPL-3
